attributes.action: pass a legislation making it compulsory for shoe manufactorers to manufacture sizes 12 to 15 in shoes and to make them accesible in most shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is extremely difficult to find mainstream shoes in sizes over 11. In the rare case that shoes are stocked in a size 12, one pair is almost always stocked whereas stacks upon stacks of other sizes are delivered. Wearing shoes that are too small for oneself effect posture, mood and comfort.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
